attributes.action: NOT to send any radioactive amunition to be used in conflict with Russia
attributes.additional_details: It is radical step UK Government trying to take which can escalate conflict up to nuclear level even if not by use of nuclear bomb it is potential of similar retaliation. It will poisons European so called "bread basket" , it will affect all population with radioactive dust with massive migration it's not a clever move. It is a radioactive polutions European population is facing .
attributes.background:
Request not to send any radioactive ammunition to be used in European conflicts like Ukraine or against Russia.
It will escalate the conflict and it will put civilians under radiation, it will affect food supply and destroy most fertilizer soil in Europe.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/635335
